resources.email_notifications: Optional, uncomment and specify your email address for notifications

script_functionality.parallel_execution: Uses 'for' loops and '&' to run multiple instances of Python scripts in parallel
script_functionality.wait: Uses 'wait' to ensure all background processes finish before continuing
script_functionality.matlab_execution: Includes options for running MATLAB in the background with '-nodisplay -batch' flags
script_functionality.module_loading: Specifies the need to load a specific MATLAB module if necessary
